it.polimi.se2019.model.deck

Class Decks

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.deck.Decks

  • public class Decks
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the implementation of the Decks' zone on the physical game board

        Init a new decks zone
        Parameters:
        weapons - List of weapons to add to the game
        powerUps - List of powerUps to add to the game
        ammoTiles - List of ammo to add to the game

        __WARN__ Lists are NOT cloned
